programme.title: NFL: America's Game
programme.desc: Revisiting Dallas Cowboys' 1995 Super Bowl victory over Pittsburgh Steelers at the Sun Devil Stadium in Tempe, Arizona. Dallas tied the record set by the San Francisco 49ers in the previous year by claiming their fifth Vince Lombardi trophy with a 27-17 victory. They also became the first team to win the showpiece match three times in four years.(n)

programme.title: NFL: America's Game
programme.desc: A look back at Denver Broncos' 1997 Super Bowl triumph over Green Bay Packers at the Qualcomm Stadium in San Diego, California. programme.title: Froch v Groves - The Fight
programme.desc: Carl Froch v George Groves. Another chance to see the bout for the WBA and IBF Super Middleweight titles, held at the Phones 4u Arena in Manchester. Froch avenged one of only two career defeats when outpointing Mikkel Kessler in his previous fight, and his greater experience at the highest level meant he went into this contest as the favourite. However, he could not afford to take Groves lightly, as the man 11 years his junior entered the match with an unblemished professional record.(n)
